unnormalised: Arrey yaar, I went to Crawford Market yesterday, and everything is so expensive! That one kilo of Alphonso mangoes was costing me Rs. 800! And the fancy imported cheese? ₹1200 for a small block. I think I'll just stick to buying my veggies from the local sabzi mandi next time – much cheaper, maybe like Rs 50/kg for tomatoes, what say?
normalised: Arrey yaar, I went to Crawford Market yesterday, and everything is so expensive! That one kilogram of Alphonso mangoes was costing me rupee eight hundred! And the fancy imported cheese? Rupee one thousand two hundred for a small block. I think I will just stick to buying my veggies from the local sabzi mandi next time – much cheaper, maybe like rupee fifty per kilogram for tomatoes, what say?
